snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - The Tragic Weapon and Tengu Princess
snippet.description:
The subject of countless legends from the days of old, Nyotengu has descended into the human world seeking something to dispel her boredom.

Nyotengu’s powerful Tengu-do strikes are difficult to imagine from her graceful beauty, and she skillfully uses her wings to execute aerial attacks that defy the norms of human capabilities.

Phase-4 is the final version of the living clone weapon designed by M.I.S.T.  She was developed with a single purpose in mind—to create the most powerful weapon in the world.

Her technique is based on Kasumi’s Mugen Tenshin Ninjutsu, with added improvements, the exact nature of which are highly classified. Every aspect of this human weapon is veiled in a black mist of secrecy.

Pre-orders are now available on all platforms. To get more information on the pre-order bonuses and digital deluxe please go here: https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/products.html

Steel Book case available from Gamestop (U.S.) and EB Games (Canada) when you pre order DOA6 while supplies last.

[official site] http://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/
[official twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official facebook] https://facebook.com/deadoralivegame
[official twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame

#DEADORALIVE6 #Phase4 #Nyotengu
